name: Atomic Design System Template
description:
Atomic Design. It's an important topic, and it's one that most of us only use in principle when we're building something new.


The reason is, a full design system is a huge endeavor, often only useful when you're tidying things up, and there are few Figma-specific and responsive systems out there.


Enter us. We've built a very simple atomic design system that you can adapt for your business/client/project.
